sen.j: 伝書（でんしょ、傳書）とは、日本の芸道などにおいて芸術や武術の流派の奥義や秘伝を記した写本や本である。
sen.e: Densho (books on the esoterica) (also written as 傳書) is a manuscript or book of secret techniques of schools of Japanese art and martial arts.

sen.j: 伝書は、今日的に言えば、一種の教科書、マニュアルとも言えるが、その内容は初心者向けや一般向けに書かれたものではない。
sen.e: It could be said as a type of textbook or a manual nowadays but not written for beginners or for general public.

sen.e: It is a manuscript that included the structure of that school, oral lesson, methods, or secret techniques that granted to an heir or the one who received mokuroku (a certificate of the completion of the art) or a permit from the master.
